definition: half/half and half/both ... and .../just as much ... as .../equally
to take part in/to participate/to join/to attend/to counsel/unequal/varied/irregular/uneven/not uniform/abbr. for 參議院|参议院 Senate, Upper House
half/semi-/incomplete/(after a number) and a half

sentences.english: In power card market, subscriber power card rise and drop half-and-half , but the oscillation amplitude squeezes obviously.
sentences.chinese: 權證市場上，認購權證漲跌參半，但振幅明顯收窄。

sentences.english: But this year, their homecoming has been bittersweet.
sentences.chinese: 但今年他們回家的心情卻是喜憂參半。

sentences.english: It also has somewhat of a mixed reputation.
sentences.chinese: 它的名聲也是譭譽參半。

sentences.english: Bungy and I had had an ambivalent relationship over years.
sentences.chinese: 我和邦迪多年來有着好惡參半的關係。

sentences.english: In human history, cities have drawn criticism as often as praise. Through the development of cities, mankind has freed itself from the restrictions of nature.
sentences.chinese: 城市在人類歷史的發展上，向來譭譽參半。

sentences.english: Many people feel ambivalent about the newly-introduced policy.
sentences.chinese: 很多人對那新推出的政策憂喜參半。

sentences.english: So far, China's efforts to rein in its roaring energy use have been mixed.
sentences.chinese: 目前爲止，中國節能降耗努力所取得的成效喜憂參半。

sentences.english: As a matter of fact , the result that the computer brings to the art design is both worried and glad .
sentences.chinese: 事實上，電腦對於美術設計帶來的結果是喜憂參半。

sentences.english: Some key indicators paint a mixed picture of the U.S. economy on Friday.
sentences.chinese: 星期五，美國經濟的幾個關健指標令人喜憂參半。

sentences.english: His new book got mixed reviews .
sentences.chinese: 對他的新書的評論譭譽參半。

sentences.english: Fado is a bittersweet style music filled with longing and yearning.
sentences.chinese: 法朵是一種苦樂參半風格的音樂，充滿了鄉愁和渴望。

sentences.english: She and her counterparts had mixed feelings about the price rise.
sentences.chinese: 王春麗和她的同行對價格上漲喜憂參半。

sentences.english: The first charge is half right.
Investment in mining in Africa has a mixed history and we should learn from it.
sentences.chinese: 非洲的礦業投資史喜憂參半，我們須從中汲取教訓。

sentences.english: Official efforts to lure manufacturers away from the coast have had mixed results.
sentences.chinese: 政府努力吸引製造企業遷離沿海地區，結果喜憂參半。
